titleStmt.title: The famous historie of Chinon of England with his strange aduentures for the loue of Celestina daughter to Lewis King of Fraunce. VVith the worthy atchiuement of Sir Lancelot du Lake, and Sir Tristram du Lions for fair Laura, daughter to Cador Earle of Cornewall, beeing all knights of King Arthurs round table. By Chr. Middleton.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Christopher, 1560?-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter, for Cuthbert Burbie, and are to be sold at his shop by the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
